title: Commentary: A road map for future data-driven urban planning and environmental health research
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Cities, Volume 155

Author(s): Georgia M.C. Dyer, Sasha Khomenko, Deepti Adlakha, Susan Anenberg, Julianna Angelova, Martin Behnisch, Geoff Boeing, Xuan Chen, Marta Cirach, Kees de Hoogh, Ana V. Diez Roux, Manuel Esperon-Rodriguez, Benjamin Flueckiger, Antonio Gasparrini, Tamara Iungman, Haneen Khreis, Michelle C. Kondo, Pierre Masselot, Robert I. McDonald, Federica Montana
